scripts.dev: npm run build && uid=$(id -u):$(id -g) docker-compose up --force-recreate
scripts.prod:TMP: npm run frontend:build:prod && npm run build
scripts.migrations: docker-compose exec php php artisan migrate
scripts.build:prod: echo $(date +%s) > tag.txt && TAG=$(cat tag.txt) uid=$(id -u):$(id -g) docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --parallel
scripts.frontend:build:dev: cd ./services/vue && docker build -t snort_builder -f Dockerfile-builder . && docker run --env env=development -v $(pwd):/app --user $(id -u) --rm snort_builder
scripts.frontend:build:prod: cd ./services/vue && docker build -t snort_builder -f Dockerfile-builder . && docker run --env env=production -v $(pwd):/app --user $(id -u) --rm snort_builder
scripts.util:docker-compose-push: $(aws ecr get-login --no-include-email) && TAG=$(cat tag.txt) docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml push
scripts.terraform:services: export TF_VAR_docker_tag=$(cat tag.txt) && cd terraform/service && terraform apply
